Uses of Interface
com.orsoncharts.plot.Plot3D

  • Packages that use Plot3D 
    Package Description
    com.orsoncharts
    Core classes, including Chart3D, Chart3DPanel and Chart3DFactory.
    com.orsoncharts.legend
    Classes related to chart legends.
    com.orsoncharts.plot
    Standard plot types (PiePlot3D, CategoryPlot3D and XYZPlot) that can be used with the Chart3D class.
    com.orsoncharts.style
    Classes for controlling chart styles.

    • Uses of Plot3D in com.orsoncharts

      Methods in com.orsoncharts that return Plot3D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Plot3D Chart3D.getPlot()
      Returns the plot, which manages the dataset, the axes (if any), the renderer (if any) and other attributes related to plotting data.
      Constructors in com.orsoncharts with parameters of type Plot3D 
      Constructor and Description
      Chart3D(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String subtitle, Plot3D plot)
      Creates a 3D chart for the specified plot using the default chart style.
      Chart3D(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String subtitle, Plot3D plot, ChartStyle style)
      Creates a 3D chart for the specified plot using the supplied style.

    • Uses of Plot3D in com.orsoncharts.legend

      Methods in com.orsoncharts.legend with parameters of type Plot3D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TableElement StandardLegendBuilder.createLegend(Plot3D plot, Anchor2D anchor, Orientation orientation, ChartStyle style)
      Creates and returns a legend (instance of TableElement) that provides a visual key for the data series in the specified plot.
      TableElement LegendBuilder.createLegend(Plot3D plot, Anchor2D anchor, Orientation orientation, ChartStyle style)
      Creates a legend for the specified plot.
      TableElement ColorScaleLegendBuilder.createLegend(Plot3D plot, Anchor2D anchor, Orientation orientation, ChartStyle style)
      Creates a new color scale legend with the specified orientation.

    • Uses of Plot3D in com.orsoncharts.plot

      Classes in com.orsoncharts.plot that implement Plot3D 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractPlot3D
      A base class that can be used to create classes that implement Plot3D.
      class  CategoryPlot3D
      A 3D plot with two category axes (x and z) and a numerical y-axis that can display data from a CategoryDataset3D.
      class  PiePlot3D
      A plot for creating 3D pie charts.
      class  XYZPlot
      A 3D plot with three numerical axes that displays data from an XYZDataset.
      Methods in com.orsoncharts.plot that return Plot3D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Plot3D Plot3DChangeEvent.getPlot()
      Returns the plot from which the event came.
      Constructors in com.orsoncharts.plot with parameters of type Plot3D 
      Constructor and Description
      Plot3DChangeEvent(java.lang.Object source, Plot3D plot, boolean requiresWorldUpdate)
      Creates a new event.

    • Uses of Plot3D in com.orsoncharts.style

      Methods in com.orsoncharts.style with parameters of type Plot3D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void ChartStyler.stylePlot(Plot3D plot)
      Applies the current style to the plot.
